The Latest on the Cut Yesterday at 11:50 p.m. Nicole Kidman Almost Married Lenny Kravitz Once Haven’t we all almost married Lenny Kravitz once or twice, though?
Yesterday at 10:34 p.m. Marc’s New York Minimalism The past and present of the city connect at an ingenious Marc Jacobs show.
Yesterday at 6:29 p.m. Where to Buy More Extremely Specific Accents We Saw at Fashion Week Including Alexander Wang tights and very studious Warby Parker glasses.
Yesterday at 6:21 p.m. CoverGirl’s First Spokesman Jokes About Africa Having Ebola Viruses and misinformation are hilarious.
Yesterday at 6:18 p.m. 5 Easy Ways to Dress Like a Calvin Klein Model Simple lessons in dressing from Raf Simons’s debut.
Yesterday at 5:47 p.m. An All-Black Look That’s Anything But Boring Day five’s Golden Peacock Award winner.
Yesterday at 5:31 p.m. Rude Court Says a Snuggie Is a Blanket, Not Clothing A Snuggie is whatever you want it to be.
Yesterday at 5:26 p.m. Here’s How to Pull Off a Jumpsuit That Screams ‘Understated Cool’ Selah Marley had the chicest look from NYFW yesterday.
Yesterday at 5:12 p.m. New York Judge Orders Drug-Addicted Mother to Not Get Pregnant Again Until she gains custody of youngest child.
Yesterday at 5:06 p.m. Enjoy This Growing Spreadsheet of Texts People Wish They Could Send Their Exes “I should have hit you harder with my car.”
Yesterday at 5:00 p.m. America Just Broke a National Stress Record Donald Trump’s victory has ushered in a new era of national anxiety.
Yesterday at 4:49 p.m. Yeezy Does It Kanye West finally delivered a credible fashion show.
Yesterday at 4:48 p.m. What’s the Deal With Essential Oils? I love using aromatherapy, but what are they actually doing?
Yesterday at 4:07 p.m. Katy Perry Watched the Marc Jacobs Show Sitting in a Folding Chair The designer took a toned-down approach this season.
Yesterday at 3:56 p.m. The Best Bathroom Essentials From bathroom décor to the best plunger, nail clipper, and bath towels.
Yesterday at 3:32 p.m. Donald Trump Says Melania Is a ‘Great Advocate’ for ‘Women’s Difficulties’ She and Ivanka are working in the White House “because they feel it,” apparently.
Yesterday at 3:07 p.m. Marc Jacobs Had the Best Beauty Trend at Fashion Week Each model got their own look.
Yesterday at 2:30 p.m. Pro-Planned Parenthood Rallies Are Happening All Across America This Weekend Nearly 100 events are planned for President’s Day weekend.
Yesterday at 2:10 p.m. We Found the Next Sellout Statement Tee of Fashion Week Baja East’s love movement.
Yesterday at 2:01 p.m. Dita Von Teese on Body Makeup, CrossFit, and Her Secret to Perfect Brows “Ever since I’ve been going to the gym with guys that don’t call paparazzi, it’s been great!”
